title: Interactive ChatGPT: Enhancing Business Communication and Collaboration
description: Focuses on improving business communication and collaboration using ChatGPT, appealing to professionals seeking practical benefits. Incorporates prompt crafting and context management, covering both basic and advanced features. Includes structured interactive sessions with real-world business scenarios, group activities, and role-playing exercises. Introduces responsible AI practices by integrating discussions on maintaining trust and accountability in AI-driven communications. Lacks clear time management strategies or checkpoints to ensure that technical and interactive elements are adequately covered during the 8-hour session.
